name: freeze
body: let cpi_accounts = SetAuthority { account_or_mint : ctx . accounts . token . to_account_info () , current_authority : ctx . accounts . auth . to_account_info () , } ;
let cpi = CpiContext :: new (ctx . accounts . token_program . to_account_info () , cpi_accounts) ;
anchor_spl :: token :: set_authority (cpi , Some (ctx . accounts . new_auth . key ()) , anchor_spl :: token :: AuthorityType :: FreezeAccount ,) ? ;

fields.name: new_auth
fields.attribute: # [doc = " CHECK: 新権限はプログラムで決定"]
